tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_data (
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  price DECIMAL(10,2),
  volume INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  volatility DECIMAL(8,6)
)

CREATE TABLE historical_pricing (
  symbol VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_pricing (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE volatility_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  volatility DECIMAL(8, 4) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE market_risk_analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  risk_score DECIMAL(8, 4) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data_sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE volatility_data_sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)
